summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions - Natural Black 32 Inch 8 Packs Pre-twisted Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crotchet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair(32 Inch,1B)
Review Date: 2020/09/10
Store: ToyoTree
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ToyoTree', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '32 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Thick,Thin', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '16 x 7.8 x 1.6 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827814338'}
Review Text: Good quality hair. Enough for a whole head. It’s super long. The twists are pretty. Easy to manage and install. Lightweight. No funny smell.
Review Title: Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions Black - 32inch 8Packs
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 1000 Pcs Acrylic Nail Kit, Coffin Nails Long Fake Nails Tips For Nail Salons And DIY Nail, Artificial Half Cover Nail Tips With Box, Nature & Clear, 10 Size
Review Date: 2020/09/14
Store: VEAFX
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Color': 'Clear', 'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'VEAFX', 'Style': 'French', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 7 x 1.4 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '782912939134'}
Review Text: Lots of nails to work with. They aren’t as thick as I’d like them to be. They’re more on the thin, flimsy plastic side. They do stay in place once applied. Overall, they’re good for what they’re for. I like that you get the regular coke and a clear set as well. Great starter kit.
Review Title: 1000 Pcs Acrylic Nail Kit
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
Review Date: 2020/09/15
Store: PRETTY FRANK
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
Review Text: I really love this deodorant. It doesn’t contain aluminum. As it states, a little goes a long way. I work in Nursing so my workload is very heavy and I sweat a lot. I’m still smelling fresh when using this. It’s easy to apply. Just grab a pinch, rub it between two fingers and apply. You don’t need to use a lot. It has a nice consistency. Not sticky. Not too think or too thick. Doesn’t stain hands or clothing. I wish the scent was a bit stronger but I still love it overall.
Review Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Toyotress Tiana Passion Braid Hair - 18 inch 8 Packs Ombre Blonde Wavy Box Braids Crochet Synthetic Braiding Hair Extensions (18 Inch, T27)
Review Date: 2020/11/06
Store: ToyoTress
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ToyoTress', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '14.57 x 9.45 x 2.91 inches; 1.45 Pounds'}
Review Text: It’s faulty soft and lightweight. Easy to install. It’s quality hair. I just don’t like the look of it. The braids are a little too big for my liking right now. The color is pretty. Not as bright as the pic. I like the length. Not too short. Not too long. Overall, I like the hair.
Review Title: Toyotress Tiana Passion Braid Hair - 18 inch 8 Packs Ombre
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Flotig Long Pre stretched Braiding Hair 30Inch 8 packs Professional Itch Free Hot Water Setting Synthetic Fiber Crochet Braiding Hair Extension Twist Braid (30Inch, 1B)
Review Date: 2020/11/06
Store: Flotig
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Flotig', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '30 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '13.34 x 9.96 x 3.62 inches; 1.67 Pounds', 'UPC': '782905065680'}
Review Text: I LOVE that it’s so long. It’s soft and lightweight. Tangles and sheds just a little. Comes in an 8 pack which is more than enough to achieve many styles. It also had hair accessories and a crochet tool included. Overall, I like it. It’s quality hair.
Review Title: Flotig Long Pre stretched Braiding Hair 30Inch 8 packs
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 Packs Pre Stretched Braiding Hair 26 Inch Ombre Professional Itch Free Synthetic Fiber Crochet Twist Braids Hair Extensions (26 Inch, 1B)
Review Date: 2020/11/06
Store: msjoli
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'msjoli', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '26 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '15.39 x 7.48 x 2.68 inches; 1.31 Pounds'}
Review Text: Good quality budget hair. You can achieve many styles with the 6 packs. It comes with hair accessories and a crochet tool. It’s medium soft and has some shedding. I like the length and the classic black color. I like it.
Review Title: 6 Packs Pre Stretched Braiding Hair 26 Inch
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Long Curly Scarf Wig 24 inch Water Wave Wigs with Soft Leopard Scarf Attached Glueless Synthetic Hair Black Curly Wigs for Women(Water Wave Black)
Review Date: 2021/04/08
Store: MarchQueen
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Polyester', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'MarchQueen', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '15.39 x 10.98 x 3.11 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303841862'}
Review Text: Very cute. Quality hair. Didn’t shed much. Soft scarf. I’m not an expert at tying it yet. Overall I love the look. Very easy to put on and take off.
Review Title: Long Curly Scarf Wig 24 inch Water Wave
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Jagat Almond Hair Oil 13.6 Oz. Combo Pack | with Vitamin E Nourishment Non Sticky and Non Greasy for Silkier & Strong Hair - (Pack of 2, 6.8 Oz X 2)
Review Date: 2021/07/26
Store: JAGAT
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Dry,Frizz', 'Scent': 'Almond', 'Liquid Volume': '6.8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'JAGAT', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 2.6 x 2.2 inches; 13.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'JGT-HAIROIL-ALMND-P2'}
Review Text: It has a pleasant scent. Lightweight. Not greasy or sticky. It’s said to be washed out. Mineral oil kinda prevents water from penetrating the scalp so I’m not sure how I feel about the main ingredient being mineral oil. I will use it for a while to see the effects.
Review Title: Jagat Almond Hair Oil 13.6 Oz. Combo Pack
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user demonstrates a preference for high-quality products that are efficient and easy to use. They appreciate the lightweight and manageable nature of various hair extensions, stating that they are easy to install and come with adequate quantity for styling. Positive sentiments are emphasized regarding the effectiveness of the natural deodorant, which remains effective during heavy physical activity. The acrylic nail kit is valued for the quantity provided, making it a solid choice for beginners. Overall, products that balance quality with functionality receive high praise.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
The user expresses some dissatisfaction with a few products, particularly the thickness of the acrylic nails, indicating that they are thinner than preferred. Some hair extensions, although deemed of good quality, did not meet aesthetic expectations, with concerns regarding the size and brightness of color. The user also showed ambivalence towards the hair oil, particularly questioning its main ingredient's effectiveness. These negative experiences highlight a desire for better performance and match to expectations in certain products.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user has encountered a mix of positive and negative experiences in their shopping journey. They appreciate the quality, usability, and effective performance of hair extensions and hygiene products. However, they express concerns over certain aspects like thickness and aesthetic satisfaction. While many purchases led to positive outcomes, a few products did not align with their preferences, suggesting a desire for improved consistency in product quality and performance.

target_interaction.title: YBOD High Puff Drawstring Afro Ponytail
target_interaction.text: Pretty puff. It’s very soft and doesn’t look cheap. It didn’t shed. The color was a bit lighter than I expected but it still worked. Easy to put on and take off.
target_interaction.title_meta: YBOD High Puff Afro Ponytail Drawstring Synthetic Brown Short Kinky Curly Hair Ponytail Hair Extension Updo Hair Extensions Curly Hair Bun with Clip (Brown)
